channel.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
channel.description: I am not even botting, I am legitly skilling on my skiller and in the past hour i've been hit by about 10 random events, is jagex bot nuking or what?

item.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Yeah it’s based off of xp.

Once you hit a certain amount of xp gained, You get a random event.

Do a dungeon or two and when you come out the random event is always imminent because of the large amount of dungeoneering xp you gained.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Davidi2:

It could be relative to your total xp or total level? Nobody really knows the exact formula, but it is based on XP

yeah it is for sure.

I have been doing fire making for a few hours (on and off with botting)

And i get a random at least once an hour. My xp rate is around 130-140k XP /hour.

My guess is that some amount of XP (just say 100k XP) within a set time (maybe 60 min) flags the random event.

Read full topic

[/quote]I sort of doubt that <3[/quote]
They actually do, They call it runescript. It’s really just a GUI that they use to do most of their work

item.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne

@bloodrayne wrote:

At the time I was gathering this info, I actually had a reason for doing it, I don’t think I went too far, I only gathered a tiny bit of data

Read full topic

item.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:36, topic:438546”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=541254.msg3967583#msg3967583 date=1333858897]
I still find that estimate very biased to be honest. I have gone 300k experience in fletching before without a single random.
[/quote]

That’s why I was clear in mentioning those records were from a fresh account I also said I can go 400k+ experience on my main without a random, so that “Random events occur every x exp” section was just an estimate based off of the gains I had on that account

If you ask me, randoms happen every x experience. When you successfully pass a random, randoms will happen for you every x+y experience, when you complete another, x+y+y. When you fail one, you will get another random at around the same experience as last time, e.g. x+y, fail, x+y, fail, x+y, complete, x+y+y, fail, x+y+y, fail, x+y+y, complete, x+y+y+y. This is a crude example lol

That sort of system made sense with the data I gathered, and the findings were reciprocated when I did something similar on my main, although the set of data wasn’t very large[/quote]

You have gone too far.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:34, topic:438546”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=541254.msg3967607#msg3967607 date=1333861523]
Being flagged gets you more randoms, can’t remember where I read it but it’d make sense(not 100% but I remember the source is fairly reliable not sure if it was on the Rs forums or Powerbot or something). The random events are random funnily enough. Xp based > constantly failing randoms > flagged is the order I think.
I know you get like a set amount of randoms or something in a set value of time, like if you have loads at once you’ll get less later on.
[/quote]

Knowing how advanced the code for RuneScape in all honesty is( I don’t care what people say)

it probably goes something like this

-Random events are random through a certain percentile that is somehow compared to your combat, plus your total experience and how it relates to your overall playing time. Each skill also probably has “trigger” where a timer of sorts starts an event for the random event to begin.

If you noticed all randoms teleport you away someway/somehow. So it makes me think the npc teleporting to a person to teleport them away is remotely related to the triggering of an event.[/quote]
Rs’s code is just crazy tbh, in Rsps you put a few hundred lines in Rs you probably put a few thousand if not more haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Loveandpower:

I still find that estimate very biased to be honest. I have gone 300k experience in fletching before without a single random.

That’s why I was clear in mentioning those records were from a fresh account I also said I can go 400k+ experience on my main without a random, so that “Random events occur every x exp” section was just an estimate based off of the gains I had on that account

If you ask me, randoms happen every x experience. When you successfully pass a random, randoms will happen for you every x+y experience, when you complete another, x+y+y. When you fail one, you will get another random at around the same experience as last time, e.g. x+y, fail, x+y, fail, x+y, complete, x+y+y, fail, x+y+y, fail, x+y+y, complete, x+y+y+y. This is a crude example lol

That sort of system made sense with the data I gathered, and the findings were reciprocated when I did something similar on my main, although the set of data wasn’t very large

Read full topic

item.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

Players gaining experience will have a higher chance of getting a Random Event
Random Events are entirely predictable and will occur after a certain amount of experience is gained within a certain period of time

Read full topic

item.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:33, topic:438546”]Being flagged gets you more randoms, can’t remember where I read it but it’d make sense(not 100% but I remember the source is fairly reliable not sure if it was on the Rs forums or Powerbot or something). The random events are random funnily enough. Xp based > constantly failing randoms > flagged is the order I think.
I know you get like a set amount of randoms or something in a set value of time, like if you have loads at once you’ll get less later on.[/quote]

Knowing how advanced the code for RuneScape in all honesty is( I don’t care what people say)

it probably goes something like this

-Random events are random through a certain percentile that is somehow compared to your combat, plus your total experience and how it relates to your overall playing time. Each skill also probably has “trigger” where a timer of sorts starts an event for the random event to begin.

If you noticed all randoms teleport you away someway/somehow. So it makes me think the npc teleporting to a person to teleport them away is remotely related to the triggering of an event.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

I found that while doing slayer I don’t get a random until teleporting out of the area of whatever I am fighting.

Kuradals dungeon is a random free area, if that’s what you’re referring to

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:26, topic:438546”][quote author=BloodRayne link=topic=541254.msg3967075#msg3967075 date=1333819619]
Randoms are based on experience gained and if you fail the event, you’ll get another random event around the same experience gains you got the previous one. If you successfully complete it, it will take longer for you to receive your next event.

I was bored a year or so ago so I recorded a few hours of alching on a new account, these were the results:

However on my main, I can go 300-400k experience before I get a random
[/quote]what are those estimations from? link to source please[/quote]

The image explains it fairly well I thought… I just recorded when I received randoms while alching on a fresh account. It’s a spreadsheet of mine, so you can cite that image as a source if you’d like >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Random Events Hitting Hard
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I can vouch for if you gain absolutely no xp since your last random event(assuming you didn’t fail it) you will not get a random until you start gaining xp.

For the most part its xp based, I’m sure if your accounts flagged etc you’ll be more likely to get one but defo xp based.

Read full topic
